sections.heading: Privacy-aware audiovisual data for research
sections.description: SYNAPSIS integrates the MaskAnyone toolkit with SURF cloud infrastructure and training for SSH researchers.

sections.heading: The Challenge & Our Solution
sections.description: Privacy barriers limit audiovisual data sharing. SYNAPSIS offers a platform and training solution for researchers.

sections.heading: What SYNAPSIS Offers
sections.description: Face masking, voice masking, body kinematics, cloud platform, training, and GDPR compliance tools.

sections.heading: Work Packages
sections.description: Platform Foundation, Platform Expansion with Survey and Co-Creation, and Platform Rollout phases.

sections.heading: Partners
sections.description: Radboud University, VU Amsterdam, University of Amsterdam, Erasmus University Rotterdam, Hasso Plattner Institute, SURF, DANS.

sections.heading: Team Co-Pilots
sections.description: The SYNAPSIS project team members and their roles.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.description: Get in touch with the SYNAPSIS team. Subscribe to updates.

sections.heading: MaskAnyone Toolkit
sections.description: The core platform for privacy-aware processing of audiovisual research data.

sections.heading: Platform Features
sections.description: Face de-identification, voice anonymization, body movement tracking, cloud infrastructure, FAIR data archiving, and user-friendly interface.

sections.heading: Research Workflow
sections.description: Five-step workflow: Upload, Configure, Process, Quality Check, and Archive.

sections.heading: Technical Stack
sections.description: System architecture, masking methods, infrastructure details, and API documentation.

sections.heading: Masking Techniques
sections.description: Face masking methods including DeepPrivacy2, pixelation, blur, and solid overlay. Audio masking via voice conversion.

sections.heading: Infrastructure & Security
sections.description: SURF cloud hosting, GDPR compliance, encryption, and performance metrics.

sections.heading: API & Integration
sections.description: REST API documentation with Python examples and access requirements.

sections.heading: Get Started with SYNAPSIS
sections.description: Register, get trained, and start masking. System requirements for web and local installation.

sections.heading: MaskAnyone in Action
sections.description: Live demonstrations of the MaskAnyone masking toolkit with before and after comparisons.

sections.heading: Face Masking Demonstration
sections.description: Sample and classroom recordings showing face masking with DeepPrivacy2 and selective multi-person detection.

sections.heading: Available Masking Techniques
sections.description: Pixelation, blur, face masking, and skeleton-only visualization methods.

sections.heading: Pose & Kinematic Data
sections.description: Body keypoint extraction with 33 body keypoints, hand landmarks, and JSON data format.

sections.heading: Masking School
sections.description: Training program for researchers, data stewards, and developers on privacy-aware data handling.

sections.heading: Learning Paths
sections.description: Structured paths for researchers (20h), data stewards (15h), and developers (18h) with certification.

sections.heading: Course Catalog
sections.description: Three-level courses: Introduction to Masking, Hands-on Workshop, and Summer/Winter School.

sections.heading: Special Events
sections.description: Masking Lab co-creation forum and Maskathon hackathon with prize pool.

sections.heading: Event Calendar 2026-2027
sections.description: Timeline of past and upcoming training events, bootcamps, and workshops.

sections.heading: Register for Training
sections.description: Registration form for training events. Open to researchers, stewards, and technical staff.

sections.heading: Documentation & Resources
sections.description: Guides, templates, tools, and publications for the SYNAPSIS platform.

sections.heading: Documentation
sections.description: Getting started guide, face masking methods, voice anonymization, pose data extraction, FAIR archiving, and API reference.

sections.heading: Templates & Forms
sections.description: Informed consent templates (Dutch/English), data management plan, metadata schema, and masking report template.

sections.heading: Code & Tools
sections.description: MaskAnyone repository, MaskBench evaluation suite, and Docker images.

sections.heading: Publications
sections.description: Research papers on face de-identification, voice anonymization, and behavioral data from 2022-2025.

sections.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.description: Answers about video formats, processing time, security, licensing, citations, and support.

sections.heading: Stakeholder Network
sections.description: Interactive visualization of the SYNAPSIS partner and stakeholder network.

sections.heading: Core Partners
sections.description: Radboud University, VU Amsterdam, University of Amsterdam, and Erasmus University Rotterdam.

sections.heading: Infrastructure Partners
sections.description: SURF, DANS, ODISSEI, and Hasso Plattner Institute providing cloud and data infrastructure.

sections.heading: Join the Network
sections.description: Become a pilot site or partner institution in the SYNAPSIS network.

sections.heading: Press & Announcements
sections.description: News coverage, press releases, and media resources about the SYNAPSIS project.

sections.heading: Radboud University launches SYNAPSIS
sections.description: Press release about the launch of SYNAPSIS platform and training programme for privacy-aware research.

sections.heading: Media Resources
sections.description: Downloadable press materials, logos, and media assets.

sections.heading: Help Shape SYNAPSIS
sections.description: Community survey to inform the design of the privacy-aware audiovisual data platform.

sections.heading: Why This Survey?
sections.description: Gather input from researchers, data stewards, and technical staff to prioritize features and training.

sections.heading: Privacy & Data Use
sections.description: Survey responses are anonymous and GDPR-compliant. No PII collected unless volunteered.
